title: Honore Level Thingy
body: My acc name is nikiciki,1-2 months ago i got 10games chat ban and my friend StayFeira,he got 14 days ban like 1month ago...bcs of my chat ban my honore is level 1 and that is ok,i was toxic,but StayFeira he got 14days ban....and his honore level is 4 right now..how is that fair???{{champion:1}}  annie is cute

replies.body: Oh, huh, yea that's pretty weird. It does look like StayFeira probably should have been lowered as well due to how the system is designed to work. I'm going to go ahead and look into what went wrong though, thanks for the heads up!

Btw can you check Mimium (EUNE) acc (that's my acc),i am support main and i got alot of honores from the games,right now i am honor lvl 5 and i got 0 honor capsule and only 2 key fragments in the previous month...I was getting more key fragments when i was honor lvl 2...
And also,i think {{champion:498}} xayah is cuter then {{champion:1}} annie.
